sentence.Network_en: St Barth'sstrange lack of street names is meant to dissuade journalistic snoopers.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣巴思这个地方非常奇怪,街道居然没有名称,其实这样做就是为了打消记者刺探新闻的念头.

sentence.Network_en: He considered emigrating, but his family managed to dissuade him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他考虑过移民，但他家人劝阻了他。

sentence.Network_en: The airport ground crew tried to dissuade the pilot from taking off.
sentence.Network_cn: 机场地勤人员试图阻止这位飞行员驾机起飞。

PerfectNetExp.abs: TOEIC词汇汇总 ... diplomacy 外交手腕；交际手段 15、 dissuade 劝阻 16、 on behalf of 代表 17、.

list.abs: mother dissuaded her from leaving home .母亲劝她不要离家出走。
they dissuaded her from going on the stage .他们劝她不要去演戏。
Instead it would drain your energy and dissuade you ., 相反 , 它会消耗你的能量和劝阻你.
How can I dissuade you from making such a decision ?, 我怎么才能说服您不做出这种决定呢?
dissonant 不谐和的dissuade from 劝止某人做dissuade 劝阻

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'advise against'): from Latin dissuadere, from dis- (expressing reversal) + suadere 'advise, persuade'

entry.tran: 劝阻;劝(某人)不要做(或相信)
entry.def: If you dissuade someone from doing or believing something, you persuade them not to do or believe it.

example.ex: Doctors had tried to dissuade patients from smoking...
example.tran: 医生们劝病人不要吸烟。

example.ex: She steadfastly maintained that her grandsons were innocent, and nothing could dissuade her from that belief...
example.tran: 她坚持认为她孙子是无辜的，什么都不能改变她这一看法。

auth_sentence.content: But don't let that discomfort dissuade you from learning.
auth_sentence.res_content: But don't let that discomfort dissuade you from learning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But don't let that discomfort dissuade you from learning.

auth_sentence.content: They said that the latest U-turn would sow confusion and dissuade purchasers.
auth_sentence.res_content: They said that the latest U-turn would sow confusion and dissuade purchasers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They said that the latest U-turn would sow confusion and dissuade purchasers.

auth_sentence.content: So it really, it does not seem like it will dissuade other marabouts.
auth_sentence.res_content: So it really, it does not seem like it will dissuade other marabouts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So it really, it does not seem like it will dissuade other marabouts.

sentences.en: I tried to dissuade her from getting married.
Chichester set off once more in spite of his friends’ attempts to dissuade him.
sentences.cn: 奇切思特不顾朋友们的劝阻,再次启程远航。
